description.narrative: The project development objective (PDO) is to increase coffee productivity and improve its quality among small-scale coffee growersin Burundi.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Acquisition and installation of a computerized accounting system | Description :No later than three (3) monthsafter effectiveness: (a) Acquire and install a computerized accounting system for the PCU with specifications satisfactory to theAssociation and thereafter utilize and maintain such system in a manner satisfactory to the Association throughout the projectimplementation of the project; and (b) ensure that the staff of the PCU are trained in the use of such system. | Due Date:01/15/2017

Finance Agreement :Establish a management information system | Description :No later than three (3) months after the EffectiveDate, establish a management information system with specifications satisfactory to the Association, and shall thereafter maintainsuch system in a manner satisfactory to the Association throughout the implementation of the Project. | Due Date :01/15/2017

Finance Agreement :Establishment of a Project Coordination Unit (PCU) | Description :Not later than twelve (12) months after theEffective Date, establish and thereafter maintain at all times during the implementation of the Project, a PCU including a Projectcoordinator, Specialists: in FM, procurement, M&E, environmental, gender&social inclusion, technical officer, internal auditor andaccountant and thereafter take all measures necessary to cause the PCU to assume project coordination and implementationresponsibility from the PRODEMA PCU. | Due Date : 10/18/2017

Finance Agreement :Recruitment of an External Auditor | Description :No later than three (3) months after the Effective Date,recruit independent auditors, with qualifications, experience, and terms of reference acceptable to the Association. | Due Date:01/15/2017

title.narrative: Additional man/days offered by CWS (by gender),
Number of new cupping labs operational in major production areas, (Number)
CWSs and dry mills equipped with eco-friendly tech/ infrastructure and/or up-graded storage facilities
Coffee trees rejuvenated through full stumping
Total area established with improved inter-cropping systems
Beneficiary satisfaction with project services (including CNAC, Inter Café)
Clients who have adopted an improved agricultural technology promoted by the project,
Share of specialty coffee of total exports
Increased coffee productivity in the project area
Share of coffee production with AA/A/FW15+ quality
Coffee Act adopted by the Ministry of Agriculture and Livestock
Coffee pricing formula accepted by InterCafé, CNAC and ARFIC
Coffee sector MIS in place and operational
